title: Return & Refund Policy
description: Policy outlining refund eligibility and procedures

sections.content: At Pathon, we strive to deliver high-quality digital learning experiences. This Return & Refund Policy outlines the terms under which learners may request refunds for paid services, and how Pathon handles such requests in a fair, transparent, and balanced manner for both learners and content creators.

sections.title: Scope of Policy

items.title: üß© Problem Solving
items.content: Paid interactions through the Problem Solving module

sections.additionalContent: ‚ö†Ô∏è No physical goods or downloadable products are sold on Pathon.

sections.title: Refund Eligibility
sections.description: When users are eligible for refunds
sections.intro: A user may be eligible for a refund if a complaint is submitted within 48 hours of purchasing or enrolling in a paid service, and the issue falls under any of the following categories:

items.title: No Content Delivered
items.content: The service lacks accessible, viewable, or functioning learning material.

items.title: Misrepresentation
items.content: The actual service content deviates significantly from its title, description, or preview.

items.title: Incomplete Content
items.content: A substantial portion of the promised content is missing or not delivered as advertised.

sections.note: Refund requests must be submitted via the appropriate reporting mechanism within the platform during the 48-hour eligibility window.

sections.title: 48-Hour Payment Holding Period
sections.description: How payments are held before being released
sections.content: All payments for eligible digital services are held in escrow by Pathon for 48 hours following the learner's purchase or enrollment.

subsections.title: ‚úÖ No Issues Reported
subsections.content: If no issue is reported within this timeframe, the full amount is released automatically to the content provider.

subsections.title: ‚è∏Ô∏è Refund Requested
subsections.content: If a refund request is submitted, the payment will remain on hold until the resolution process is complete.

sections.title: Refund Review and Resolution Process
sections.description: How refund requests are reviewed and resolved

items.title: üîç When a refund request is submitted:
listItems: ‚Ä¢ Pathon will assess the issue by reviewing the reported content, comparing it with the description, and contacting the content provider if needed.
‚Ä¢ We aim to resolve most cases within 10 business days.
‚Ä¢ For non-straightforward or complex cases, Pathon may extend this timeframe at its sole discretion to ensure a fair and thorough investigation.

outcomes.content: A full refund will be issued to the learner.
The held funds will be released to the content provider.

sections.note: ‚ö†Ô∏è Pathon's decision in all refund matters will be considered final and binding.

sections.title: Non-Refundable Circumstances
sections.description: Situations where refunds are not provided
sections.intro: Refunds will not be issued under the following circumstances:
items: ‚úó The learner changes their mind after purchase
‚úó The learner accessed or substantially completed the content before submitting a complaint
‚úó The learner failed to attend a scheduled live class without prior notice or valid justification
‚úó The refund request was submitted after the 48-hour eligibility window

sections.title: Abuse Prevention
sections.description: Measures to prevent misuse of the refund system
sections.content: To maintain fairness and platform integrity, users who are found to be repeatedly misusing the refund process may be subject to:
listItems: ‚ö†Ô∏è Refund privileges being limited or suspended

sections.title: Refund Method and Timing
sections.description: How and when refunds are processed

items.title: üí≥ Refund Method
items.content: All approved refunds will be processed to the original method of payment

items.title: ‚è±Ô∏è Processing Time
items.content: Depending on the payment gateway or financial provider, it may take 5 to 10 business days for the refunded amount to reflect
